redeemVoucher.title: Redeem Voucher
redeemVoucher.confirm: Do you wish to redeem this voucher now?
redeemVoucher.warning: This can only be done once and cannot be undone.
redeemVoucher.redeemed.consumer: For the consumer: Please show this screen to the retailer to confirm the voucher has been redeemed.
redeemVoucher.redeemed.retailer: For the retailer: This voucher has been redeemed. Please check the redemption date above is today's date and time.
redeemVoucher.redeemNotice: Click the 'Redeem Now' button when requested by the retailer to redeem this voucher. The voucher may only be redeemed once, and must only be redeemed when requested by the retailer.
redeemVoucher.error.invalidVoucher: This voucher is not a valid voucher.
redeemVoucher.error.alreadyUsed: This voucher has already been redeemed.
redeemVoucher.error.badRetailer: This voucher is not valid for this retailer.
redeemVoucher.error.general: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.
redeemVoucher.error.tryAgain: Please try again with another voucher.
